text:
e="preserve">Korea Teachers of English to Speakers of Other Languages is an academic and professional association that helps teachers of English as a Foreign Language (EFL). It is often called KOTESOL for short.
History.
KOTESOL started in 1992 when the Association of English Teachers in Korea (AETK) and the Korea Association of Teachers of English (KATE) joined.
Annual conference.
KOTESOL has a conference every year with papers, keynote speakers, workshops, and social events.
